member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Tools.AssemblyHandler
member.summary: Handles assembly-related operations such as loading, scanning for extensions, and managing driver configurations. Core partial class containing fields, properties, and constructor.

member.summary:
Official Microsoft plugin pattern from: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tutorials/creating-app-with-plugin-support
Uses AssemblyDependencyResolver to resolve plugin dependencies from .deps.json Returns null to allow default context to provide shared assemblies
